itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, December 31, 2013
title: Europe's stock market growing, but economy waiting to improve
teaser: European stocks are set to rise, but that's not the only measure of economic growth.
contentencoded: On this last day of trading for 2013, a reminder that the stock market is by no means a measure of well-being. Case in point, Europe. Stock markets across the continent are set to climb about 20 percent for 2013. But as the BBC's Andrew Walker explains, that's not necessarily due to an overall economic improvement in the Eurozone.
description: European stocks are set to rise, but that's not the only measure of economic growth.
